##========================================================================
## DESCRIPTION
=pod

=head1 DESCRIPTION

DiaColloDB::WWW::Handler::static
provides a
L<DiaColloDB::WWW::Handler|DiaColloDB::WWW::Handler>-compliant class
for handling static data files.

=cut

##----------------------------------------------------------------
## DESCRIPTION: DiaColloDB::WWW::Handler: globals
=pod

=head2 Globals

=over 4

=item Variable: @ISA

DiaColloDB::WWW::Handler::static inherits from
L<DiaColloDB::WWW::Handler|DiaColloDB::WWW::Handler>.

=back

=cut


##----------------------------------------------------------------
## DESCRIPTION: DiaColloDB::WWW::Handler::static: Methods
=pod

=head2 Methods

=over 4

=item new

 $h = $class_or_obj->new(%options);

%options, %$h:

 contentType => $mimeType,    ##-- override MIME type e.g. 'text/plain; charset=utf8'; default via MIME::Types::mimeTypeOf()
 charset => $charset,         ##-- default charset for text types (default='utf8')
 file => $filename,           ##-- filename to serve

=item run

 $rsp = $h->run($server, $clientConn, $httpRequest);

Handles a server request for a static file C<$h-E<gt>{file}>.

=back
